trainer.repeatToggleLabel: Toggle mode to repeat questions you answered incorrectly.
trainer.title: Question trainer

instructions.buildList: Put together a list of questions below and then start training.

trainer.showAnswer: Click here to show the answer

help.whatIsText: An effective way to learn new things is by starting with a question, find the answer, and repeat that. So when you are studying from books for instance, you can turn everything you didn't know into questions. You then find the answer for it. When you repeat the questions till you know them, you are effectively studying. This app helps you doint that.
help.step2: For each book you then add chapters.
help.step3: For each chapter you then add questions.
help.step4: Put questions you want to study in the list.
help.step5: Press start to train the questions.
help.readyTitle: How do I know I am ready for the exam?
help.ready1: When you have been honest with yourself, and you have created a question for every little thing you did not know yet.
help.ready2: You have repeated the list of questions several times while answering all questions correctly.

importExport.warning: This will overwrite your current library. It is advised to export your current library first.
importExport.selectHint: Select the library you have exported earlier

questionList.title: Question list
questionList.countAria: Number of questions in the list.
questionList.addInstructionsAria: Instructions on how to add a question to the list.
questionList.addInstructionsPrefix: Add questions to this list by using the
questionList.addInstructionsSuffix: button on books, chapters and individual questions.
questionList.clearTitle: Removes all questions in the list

tabs.defaultBody: Add tab pages by using 'app-tab-page' components.

tabPage.empty: This tab page has no content yet.
tabPage.emptyHint: Use the 'slot' of the tab-page component to add content.

record.questionsAria: Number of questions in this chapter
